title: Contains Duplicate
prompt: Given an integer array nums, return true if any value appears more than once in the array, otherwise return false.
hints: Think about what data structure allows you to check if an element already exists quickly.
A Set or hash table can track which numbers you've seen so far.
Iterate through the array and for each number, check if it's already in your set. If yes, return true. If no, add it to the set.
After iterating through all numbers without finding a duplicate, return false.
